title: Power cut schedule for next three days
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says it has approved the Ceylon Electricity Board’s request to impose power cuts lasting 3 hours and 20 minutes for the next three days, from April 25th to April 27th.
Areas ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW - 2 hours between 9.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m. & 1 hour and 20 minutes between 5.30 p.m. and 9.30 p.m.
Demand Management Schedule (25-27th April 2022) by Adaderana Online on Scribd
